meanings.definition: A large herbivorous mammal with a barrel-shaped body and short legs, native to sub-Saharan Africa.
meanings.sent1: The hippopotami waded in the river, their barrel-shaped bodies moving gracefully through the water.
meanings.sent2: We saw a group of hippopotami grazing peacefully by the riverbank.
meanings.sent3: The hippopotami decided to have a dance-off to show off their short legs.
meanings.sent4: The hippopotami's barrel-shaped bodies resembled floating islands in the river.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the hippopotami wallowing in the mud was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'hippopotamus'.
meanings.sent1: Look at all those hippopotami in the zoo enclosure!
meanings.sent2: The guide pointed out the hippopotami in the distance.
meanings.sent3: The hippopotami held a meeting to discuss their favorite foods.
meanings.sent4: The field was filled with hippopotami, creating a surreal scene.
meanings.sent5: The hippopotami's grunts echoed through the night, creating a symphony of sounds.
